com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.multi

Interface OfferDiscipline

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllDiscipline, ParallelFootprintDiscipline

    public interface OfferDiscipline
    Interface used by MultiServiceEventClient to enforce the services which should or shouldn't be receiving offers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateServices(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> serviceNames)
      Updates the discipline's internal state with a list of all known services.
      boolean updateServiceStatus(java.lang.String serviceName, MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse statusResponse)
      Updates the state of the offer discipline with the service's status information.

    • Method Detail

      • updateServices

        void updateServices(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> serviceNames)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the discipline's internal state with a list of all known services. This may include services which are in the process of uninstalling, etc. This is called before a series of zero or more calls to #offersEnabled(AbstractScheduler).
        Parameters:
        serviceNames - names of active services
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if updating internal state has a problem

      • updateServiceStatus

        boolean updateServiceStatus(java.lang.String serviceName,
                            MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse statusResponse)
        Updates the state of the offer discipline with the service's status information. Returns whether the specified service should be allowed to be provided with offers.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - name of the active service
        statusResponse - the status response returned by the service
        Returns:
        whether to provide the service with offers
